name: Jesús Dugarte
bio: I fell in love with Ruby, like most, through Rails. For the past 10 years Ruby's eloquence and expressiveness have radically changed the way I code and build software solutions

name: Jean-François Labbé
bio: Hello, I'm a devOps Engineer and full stack developer, love the design and testing principles enforced by the ruby community

name: Jesús Gómez
bio: I'm working with a Ruby based Ruby backend legacy System. I found it a powerful language but dangerous at the same time, so a good discipline is key for working with it. I'll try to share some of my experience here.

name: Josh Morrow
bio: I've been using ruby professionally for five years. It was the first language I really fell in love with, and it's still my goto tool for quite a few tasks including web development.

name: Jackie Potts
bio: Hi! I'm a Ruby developer from NYC looking to help grow the community and get more people writing Ruby!

name: Justin Leveck
bio: I love Ruby! I have been writing Ruby for more than 5 years. Ruby is a joy to use. It is expressive and readable with a wonderful community. I am excited to help you get started!

name: Joel Taylor
bio: Ruby was my gateway from English-lit to programming. I've been using it professionally for over five years and love it!

name: Jim Kyle
bio: After years of light web development in the financial industry, I changed course to follow my passion for software development. I love working with Ruby and Javascript and am currently building my knowledge around Elixir, Java, React, and Angular.
